messages.title: I'm backing Frank...
messages.content: Thelma Dowsett, a Cromer Street resident, expresses her support for Frank Dobson, citing Labour's support for people and protective measures that have helped her community, such as the winter fuel payment. She voices her concern over the Tories and Lib Dems making cuts to public services.

messages.title: Putting local people first
messages.content: Frank Dobson pledges to prioritize the needs of local people in Camden.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support for Schools, Hospitals, and Research & Development
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Labour Government that has better invested in schools, hospitals, research & development, taking climate change into account.
Supports measures for older people, children and parents.

issues.socialWelfare: Support for older people, children and parents.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will continue to speak up for local people and do my best to help.

politicalExperience.role: Campaign against the Iraq War, top-up fees, and 42 days detention
Campaign with local parents for a new school South of Euston Road
Campaign against the Tory/Lib Dem council selling off local homes
Press for tough laws to regulate and tax banks, hedge funds and private equity
